text: Richard Niederbacher (born 7 December 1961) is an Austrian former professional football player and coach. ==Club career== Niederbacher played for Sturm Graz, SV Waregem, Paris Saint-Germain, Stade Reims, First Vienna, Rapid Wien, Vorwärts Steyr, LASK Linz, Pécsi Mecsek and DSV Leoben. ==Manager career== He managed different teams in lower Austrian classes. ==International career== He debuted for the Austrian national team on 28 March 1984 in a away loss versus France. His last match was on 5 February 1988 versus Switzerland. He played four matches for Austria.ÖFB Profile Richard-Niederbacher ==Honours== **with SK Rapid Wien: *Austrian Champion: 1987 Austrian Cup:1987 ==References== ==Other websites== * *Player profile - Weltfußball *Player profile - RapidArchiv Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian footballers Category:Players of the Austrian national football team Category:SK Sturm Graz players Category:SK Rapid Wien players Category:Austrian football managers Category:Association football forwards Category:Austrian football champions
title: Richard Niederbacher
